actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the disposal of beryl ore from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to dispose of approximately 18,000 short tons of beryl ore equivalents now held in the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile, provided that the time and method of disposition be fixed with regard to protection of the United States against avoidable loss and disruption of markets.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the disposal of beryl ore from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile.
